statements.english: I used to play basketball in high school

statements.chinese: 当我(过去)在高中的时候
statements.english: when I was in high school

statements.chinese: 我过去常常打篮球当我在高中的时候
statements.english: I used to play basketball when I was in high school

statements.chinese: 当我(过去)是年轻的时候
我过去常常下象棋当我(过去)是年轻的时候
statements.english: I used to play chess when I was young

statements.chinese: 我过去每天早上都会看卡通片
statements.english: I used to watch cartoons every morning

statements.chinese: 当我(过去)是一个孩子的时候
我过去每天早上都会看卡通片当我(过去)是一个孩子的时候
statements.english: I used to watch cartoons every morning when I was a kid

statements.chinese: 我过去每天早上喝咖啡

statements.chinese: 我过去每天早上喝咖啡
statements.english: I used to drink coffee every morning

statements.chinese: 我过去每天早上喝咖啡但是现在我更喜欢茶
statements.english: I used to drink coffee every morning but now I prefer tea
she used to be a teacher

statements.chinese: 但是她辞去了她的工作
但是去年她辞去了她的工作
statements.english: but she quit her job last year
she used to be a teacher

statements.chinese: 她曾经是一名老师但是她去年辞去了她的工作
statements.english: she used to be a teacher but she quit her job last year
you used to be a smoker
you used to be a smoker

statements.chinese: 你曾经是一个烟民但是现在你戒了
statements.english: you used to be a smoker but now you quit

statements.chinese: 我们曾经是陌生人但是现在我们是朋友
statements.english: we used to be strangers but now we are friends

statements.chinese: 我们曾经是亲密的朋友
statements.english: we used to be close friends

statements.chinese: 我们曾经是亲密的朋友但是再也不是了
statements.english: we used to be close friends but not anymore

statements.chinese: 她过去爱他但是再也不会了
statements.english: she used to love him but not anymore
to drive a car to work
he drives a car to work

statements.chinese: 他过去常常开车去工作但是再也不会了
statements.english: he used to drive a car to work but not anymore

statements.chinese: 他曾经在那个公司工作
statements.english: he used to work at that company

statements.chinese: 他曾经在那个公司工作但是再也不会了
statements.english: he used to work at that company but not anymore

statements.chinese: 我们过去常常去那个餐厅
statements.english: we used to go to that restaurant

statements.chinese: 我们过去常常去那个餐厅但是再也不会了
statements.english: we used to go to that restaurant but not anymore
you are not my boss anymore

statements.chinese: 你再也不是我的老板。我辞职。
statements.english: you are not my boss anymore I quit
he doesn't play video games anymore
